name: 𝕁𝕌ℕℚ𝕀𝕆ℕ
description:
This is my fast paced, neon style puzzle Game! 

The player needs to get to the crown by going through the right portals.

Watch the trailer here:

I made this game as a school assignment At the moment I have no idea what I'm planning to do with it. 

I'd like to make a mobile game out of this but that would take a lot of work since this is a 3D project. I think a 2D version of this game would be more fitted as a mobile game. For now it's pc exclusive. :)

this game was made in Unity, All the contents in this game are made by me (Voodoodoo) and are free to use, as long as you just tag me or give me some credit in any form.
